description: Did you know that the surface area of the small intestine is about the size of a tennis court?1 Or that you have more than 100 million nerve cells in the lining of your gastrointestinal tract?2 And that's not even close to the 100 trillion microbes in your gut!3 The digestive system is kind of a BIG deal, literally. It's a complex place, filled with diverse organisms that affect other critical functions, including the immune system and brain, which means promoting gut health is paramount.
